data.title: Kelly McGillis Net Worth, Salary, House and Biography
data.meta_description: American actress, Kelly McGillis's net worth is around $10 Million as of 2024. She earns an estimated salary of over $1 million per year.
data.text:
American actress, Kelly McGillis’s Net Worth is estimated to be $10 Million. Kelly McGillis is a rich woman who is also quite famous. She began her career with stage acting, later making her screen debut and gaining fame. She has appeared in several films and television shows and has been quite successful.

Kelly’s roles in Top Gun, Witness, and similar films of the early 90s have brought her immense success. She is an acting teacher in North Carolina, where she also lives. Currently, Kelly McGillis has a net worth of $10 million. You may also check Kate McKinnon’s Net Worth.

What is Kelly McGillis’s Net Worth?

American actress, Kelly McGillis’s net worth is around $10 Million as of 2024. She earns an estimated salary of over $1 million per year. McGillis’ wealth likely derived from her acting career, which includes films such as Top Gun and Thelma and Louise.

Kelly McGillis House and Cars

Kelly McGillis is an American celebrity who owns a variety of properties in the US. She lives in Hendersonville, North Carolina, where she has a very beautiful home. Kelly McGillis also owns a home in Florida, which she visits often.

Kelly McGillis has several cars in her garage. Although she hardly drives these days, she loves cars. She owns a very beautiful Chevrolet Camaro SS, Ford Mustang, Mercedes Benz, etc.

Kelly McGillis Biography

Kelly Ann McGillis was born on July 9, 1957, in Newport Beach, California, United States. McGillis grew up mostly in Los Angeles, where she lived with her parents (Donald Mansion McGillis and Virginia Joan) and siblings. She was the eldest of her parents’ three daughters. Her father was a physician while her mother was a homemaker. She has German ancestry from her mother’s side and Scottish-Irish ancestry from her father’s side.

After completing her studies and obtaining a GED, she moved to New York City to fulfill her desire to become an actress. She studied acting at the Juilliard School and later graduated from Group 12 in 1983. She later entered the screen and played roles in some of the most successful and famous movies of all time. Before entering television and films, she played roles in several plays and theaters. You may also like Millie Gibson’s Net Worth.

Kelly McGillis: Career and Awards

Kelly McGillis started her career with stage acting. While she was associated with Julliard School, she used to take part in several plays like Love for Love, and several off-broadway and Broadway productions. From the late 1980s to the 2000s, she was a respected member and actress of the Shakespeare Theatre Company, where she performed in a very successful play, Duchess of Malfi.

Some of her later stage works include Don Juan, The Merchant of Venice, Twelfth Night, and many more. In 1983, her film debut came in Reuben, which gave her early success. Soon, she worked in some of the most successful movies like Witness, Top Gun, etc. Both movies were massive hits, and they rose her to prominence.

McGillis continued to make his mark in the film industry with notable roles in successful films such as “Top Gun” with Tom Cruise, “Made in Heaven” with Timothy Hutton, and “The Accessed” with Jodie Foster. She also had a recurring role on the television series “The L Word“, showcasing her versatility and talent.

She played a part in a romantic movie named Made in Heaven, in 1987. She took a break from movies and later came in 2007. She hasn’t done anything extraordinary in television. McGillis has not won any awards or Accolades thought, though she has been nominated for BAFTA awards and others. Check out Dawn French’s Net Worth.

Education

Kelly McGillis did her early schooling at Newport Harbor High School. Later she went to Allan Hancock College where she joined the Pacific Conservatory of the Performing Arts. She obtained a GED degree and later dropped out of college in 1975. Later she went to the Juilliard School and completed her graduation in 1983.
